mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Powell, W. Angelo
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 12 1862. By Telegraph from Charleston 12 1862. company G first 1st Va Cavalry is ordered on immediate Duty there is not authorized officer here to take command I wish to know about commission at once by Telegraph W Angelo Powell 29D92pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Powell, W. Angelo
Charleston, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
